<h3 id="X31792">X(31792) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: HUTSON INTOUCH AND INCIRCLE-CIRCLES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(-10*a*b*c+(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31792) = 5*X(1)-X(65) = 7*X(1)-3*X(354) = 3*X(1)-X(942) = 3*X(1)+X(3057) = 5*X(1)-3*X(5049) = 7*X(1)+X(5697) = 11*X(1)-3*X(5902) = 9*X(1)-X(5903) = X(1)+3*X(5919) = 9*X(1)-5*X(17609) = 13*X(1)-5*X(18398) = 4*X(1)-X(31794) = 5*X(8)-9*X(3921) = X(10)-3*X(10179) = 7*X(65)-15*X(354) = 3*X(65)-5*X(942) = X(72)+3*X(3241) = X(72)-5*X(3890) = X(145)+3*X(392) = 3*X(145)+5*X(3876) = 5*X(145)+7*X(4533) = 9*X(392)-5*X(3876) = 15*X(392)-7*X(4533) = 3*X(3241)+5*X(3890)</b>
<p>X(31792) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {8,3921}, {10,10179}, {12,7743}, {30,10105}, {72,3241}, {145,392}, {226,31822}, {355,1058}, {388,22793}, {390,18481}, {474,3895}, {495,9955}, {496,9956}, {497,18480}, {515,15172}, {516,31776}, {518,3884}, {519,4015}, {550,4315}, {551,5836}, {910,9327}, {938,1000}, {944,9856}, {950,15170}, {952,9947}, {960,3244}, {971,5882}, {1056,9785}, {1125,3880}, {1279,15955}, {1387,13411}, {1483,31821}, {1698,3893}, {2136,9709}, {2771,12735}, {2802,3636}, {3058,26088}, {3085,11230}, {3086,11231}, {3486,17622}, {3487,3656}, {3488,5777}, {3555,3623}, {3616,10914}, {3621,3697}, {3622,3753}, {3625,3740}, {3632,25917}, {3646,4915}, {3655,4313}, {3683,5288}, {3698,25055}, {3816,10915}, {3848,3918}, {3851,5726}, {3869,20057}, {3871,17614}, {3889,4018}, {3957,5330}, {3983,4677}, {4002,5550}, {4292,28198}, {4297,10386}, {4298,28174}, {4301,6147}, {4314,11035}, {4342,21620}, {4853,11108}, {5248,11260}, {5434,28202}, {5439,14923}, {5559,13602}, {5572,31806}, {5690,11019}, {5719,5806}, {5790,13867}, {5844,6738}, {5881,10157}, {5886,6964}, {5887,8236}, {5901,13405}, {6001,13607}, {6284,28168}, {6736,17527}, {6744,28234}, {7354,28154}, {7967,12672}, {8091,10968}, {8167,14150}, {9578,9669}, {9580,9655}, {9589,18541}, {9613,9668}, {9614,9654}, {9708,12629}, {9843,12640}, {9845,12684}, {10056,11376}, {10106,15171}, {10459,17460}, {10578,10595}, {10580,12245}, {10624,18990}, {10827,11238}, {10866,18526}, {10912,12260}, {11362,21625}, {12513,31445}, {12577,24470}, {12609,13463}, {12645,18530}, {12705,30283}, {12908,31767}, {14986,26446}, {15888,30384}, {15935,31837}, {21627,31419}, {31231,31436}, {31430,31433}</p>
<p>
X(31792) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 9957}, {3, 13600}, {942, 3057}, {944, 9856}, {960, 3244}, {1482, 31786}, {7982, 31793}, {10106, 15171}, {10624, 18990}, {12735, 15558}, {12908, 31767}, {23340, 31788}<br>
X(31792) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3812, 3636), (5045, 1), (5806, 13464), (9940, 15178), (24470, 12577), (31787, 1385), (31794, 5045), (31795, 15172), (31797, 3)<br>
X(31792) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 7982, 15934), (5903, 17609, 942), (10246, 23340, 31788)<br>
</p>
